Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to increase the ATK of "Flamvell Uruquizas" starts a Chain.\n2. If you use "Shrink" on "Flamvell Uruquizas" you halve the original ATK and then add the increases. So the ATK will be 1050 + 300 for each time its effect resolved.

PSCT.Tengu:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuners
① Inflicts Piercing Damage.
② If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: It gains 300 ATK.
